Text: yeah, like any of you illiterates are gonna read it. go back and jerk off to your porn

Actually it's "Tais-toi!". French requires a hyphen be used in an imperative pronominal form. What carries the same message, in a more convincing way, without the use of a hyphen is "Ta yeule!" meaning "Ta gueule!" ("Shut up!") in a French-Canadian dialect called Joual, a dialect spoken notably by Jack Kerouac.
